1.content:
Jak comes home from school, and he had a hard day. So he does his Homework, chores, and all that good stuff.

Then he takes a nap......
1.title: The Dream Starts Here....

choices: Jasmine is looking down at him
11.content:
Jake woke up to find himself in his house. Only this time, it was somewhat different. The roof was gone and the rest of of his house was destroyed but the living room was intact.

He got up and looked around, other houses had been destroyed though no one was in theirs. The sky was dark with storm clouds blocking out the sun.

Just then....
11.title: Jasmine is right there

111.content:
Suddenly, Jak felt he was being watched as a large shadow covered him. He turned his eyes to the left and then to the right and then finally up. It was then he realised who was watching him.

There was the most beautiful girl. The tallest too. Jasmine stood above him , her legs towering above him. She was wearing a pair of shorts and a a little T-shirt that covered her torso well.

" Hi there Jak, ready for the trip?" she asked him. " How can I go on a trip when my house is destroyed?"

" Not a vacation but to a safe spot , away from the danger. " she looked around, worried as though something would happen.
111.title: Jasmine is looking down at him

1111.content:
Jasmine picked Jake up and held him in her cupped hands. Her long brunette hair blocked one of her blue eyes. Her legs were smooth with no blemish or flaws of any kind. Her chest was perfect for her proportions. In other words, drop dead gorgeous.

" Wow, being 50 feet tall must be cool-" he was about to finish when a pool of water turned black and began to bubble. It became more like tar in its viscosity. A figure began to rise out of the water , clothed in black, black trousers, long sleeved shirt that partially covered his hands.


He wore a black trenchcoat that fit him well. His face was covered by a metal mask, silver in colour( like one of these maks worn by Japanese samurai). He was of Jakes size but much taller. He stood at around 2m in height. In one hand , he wielded a katana whilst in the other , it was pulsing with dark energies radiating out from his finger.

He spoke in a voice that was slow yet sinsiter. " Give me the boy, Jasmine. Or esle I will have to resort to less pleasent means of dealing with you." he said.

' Who is he?" Jake asked, unsure of what was going on except that Jasmine holding him with more force than usual.

" Allow me to introduce myself. I am Nostory, Lord of the Daemonic Horde. She has been charged with treason and was convicted to death." he said , his voice displaying no emotion, pointing at her.

" Rubbish, he is not what he claims to be." says Jasmine. " One last time, hand over the boy or you will feel pain a thousand times greater than what you have felt in your short time in existence." he said, a little angry.

" Come and get him then, demon." said Jasmine. " Its Daemon, you bitch!" he screamed at her, firing dark energy into the clouds.

Do they manage to escape?
1111.title: Somebody evil shows up

11111.content:
Jak looked up at the cloud. The could looked like it was going to shoot out dark beams of energy.
"Jasmine, I think we should run!" Jak said.
"Yeah, here let me hold you." Jasmine said.
She picked up Jak, held him in her hand, and started running.
11111.title: RUN!!!!!!!!!!

choices: They met someone whose in the way.
111111.content:
It took a while, but both Jak and Jasmine were able to lose the Daemon Lord. They decided to stop and rest for a while. They could still see clouds of dark energy closing in.even though he's still farther away, the size of the clouds was huge. This displayed how much power he has.

"Hey, Jasmine," Jak started to ask. "How come that demon guy was after you? Heck! Why are you 50 feet tall, anyway?"

"I don't know." She answered. "When I came to, I was 50 feet tall. Then this guy was trying to kill me." Why was this happening? This was the question that ran through both their minds.There were too many unanswered questions, and hardly any time to wonder as the clouds now started to cover the area.

"He's getting closer," Jak stated. "We have to move, now!" They both started to stand up. Jasmine picked Jak up and started to carry him.
111111.title: Why is this Happening?

choices: Shoot a direct hit at the Daemon Lord
1111111.content:
They kept going further...

As soon as they reach the end of the city limits, a powerful force struct at Jak. "Jak...are you there? Jak? JAK!!!"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------
Jak was cut off from the real world and was floating on darkness...

"Where am I?"
JAK
"Who's that"
I COME IN PEACE, I AM JUST SUPPORTING YOU FROM INSIDE YOUR CONSCIOUS. LISTEN VERY CLOSELY TO WHAT I AM ABOUT TO TELL YOU.
"Ok?"
THE REASON WHY I PUT YOU IN A COMA IS SO YOU CAN HEAR ME ON WHAT I SAY ABOUT THE DANGER YOUR IN. NOW...I'M PRETTY SURE YOU ARE RUNNING AWAY FROM THE DAEMON LORD, AM I CORRECT?
"Yes!! Whoever you are, I need answers...Why is he chasing us?"
ALL OF THAT WILL BE REVEALED...IN THE MEANTIME, WHEN YOU COME BACK FROM THE COMA, I WILL GIVE YOU A WEAPON THAT WILL FEND OFF THE DAEMON LORD...TIMES UP, I WILL BE IN TOUCH AS SOON AS I CAN...SAYONARA
"Wait...why are you helping us?"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------
"Jak...you almost scared me...I thought you were dead" said Jasmine, "that stupid freak is still chasing us".

Jak, recovering from that comma, realized he was holding a weapon, just as his conscious has predicted...He aimed the gun at the target....and.......
1111111.title: They kept going further.

choices: No. He was sent to help them.
1111112.content:
"It's no use," a voice suddenly called out to them. "At this rate, you'll never escape or be able to to defeat Nostory." Both Jak and Jasmine looked around to see where it was coming from. "Over here." Something came out of the shadows and right in front of them.

The figure wasn't as tall as Nostory, but a few feet shorter. He wore all black, from his leather boots to his body suit and his helmet, which was kinda like the black version of Halo's helmet with a red visor. He was sort of a lizard tail and bat/demonic wings sticking out of his back. It didn't seem like he was some kind of superhero. In fact, it's not much, but he was also emitting the same kind as Nostory's.

"Are you a demon?" Jak asked.

"It's 'Daemon,' boy." The figure answered back. "My name is Shadow. I'm nothing but a bounty hunter. My only allegiance is to those who pay good money for my jobs."

"Aren't you working for that Nostory guy?" Jasmine had to ask.
1111112.title: Friend or foe?

choices: The Cake is not a lie
11111121.content: Jak kissed her and then he woke up. It was all a dream. No Jak, Nosterores said, you are the daemons. And then Jak was the daemons and Jak died.
11111121.title: Awake

choices: Shadow give Jak any ablity he wants.
11111122.content:
"You two look like you could use some help." Shadow said. "But for a price."
"How 50 bucks sounds to you?" Jak said he wasn't willing to pay up, he was saving for Super Smash Bros. Brawl.
"I'll take it." said Shadow. He took the money. "Ok then I'll teleport us."
11111122.title: 50 Bucks

111111222.content:
They were interrupted by a blast of dark energy from the clouds. It hit the ground as Nostory emerged from the energy. " You really shouldn't run, it makes your deaths all the more painful." he said.

He looked at Shadow. " Ah yes, Shadow. My old friend, getting desperate are we now, accepting jobs for a mere 50 bucks, you really disappoint me." he said. " Now, let me have those two and for old times sake, I'll spare your life. " said Nostory. " Not this time, old friend." he said ufurling his claws and letting out a roar.

Shadow charged towards Nostory , aiming for his throat. Nostory side stepped him.

Then, Nostory grabbed his tail and with his sword, cut it off, causing Shaodw to roar out in pain. This caused Jake and Jasmine to worry. " We must help him or he'll die." said Jamsine. " Nostory's too powerful, you might get killed if we intervene." replied Jake.

Do they help Shadow?
111111222.title: Found

1111112221.content:
" Lets just help, Shadow is our best shot at stopping Nostory." said Jasmine. Jake agreed. " Just throw him some distance away.' said Jake. Jamsine went to the pair to grab Nostory.

Shadow was dealt a punch in the stomach. " You have no idea what I'm capable of , fool. You should not have returned." kneeing him in the chest. Shaodw fell to the gorund. He took out his sword and prepared to finsh him off when he was grabbed by Jasmine.

Jasmine had grabbed the tiny Daemon( to her) and tried to contain. He swung his sword and stabbed her in the hand. Jasmine cried out in pain as a a large gash appeared on her hand. She dropped him due to the pain but felt it disappear as the wound healed itself within seconds.

Nostory looked at Jasmine's hand and realised something. " She's more powerful than I thought." he said to himdself. Summoning a vortex of darkness, he engulfed himself in it before it rocketed into the sky.

Jake and Jasmine rushed to Shadow's side. " Will you be ok?" they asked him.
1111112221.title: Yes

choices: Unfortunately, Shadow died before the machine activated
Jak was able to save him before things got grim.
11111122212.content:
Shadow struggled to try to get up, but his injuries were great. Both Jasmine and Jak could hear him coughing in pain in wheezing heavily. They wanted to help since he did try to save their live. Problem is they don't even know what to do. He wasn't the same as a normal human being.

"...Boy...remote...sleeve..." Shadow was desperately trying to tell Jak. Jak was able to figure out what he was saying. He searched Shadow's sleeves and found a hidden panel on his right arm. There were many small buttons and a bigger red one higher up. "...Press...red..." Shadow was able to mutter out. Jak did just that.

Afterwards, suddenly a weird thing appeared in the sky above them. It look like a black mechanical manta ray. It slowly descended lower and lower until it touched the ground. It was the size of maybe 5 buses, though it was about a foot tall to Jasmine.

"Boy..." Shadow was trying to tell him. "My Deathray...there's a medical repair pod...inside. Bring me to it." He then stared at the 50-foot Jasmine. "You...focus on shrinking. You have to... *cough* come in, too.""

Jasmine was confused at what he said. Focus on shrinking. She decided to try it and thought about returning to her 4-foot-11 height. Jak watched in amazement as Jasmine shrunk back down from 50-feet to 40, then 30, 20, 10. She ending up back to her original height. She was surprised.

"Jak, it work!" She exclaimed. "I'm no longer a giant freak!" "Quit wasting time and get in!" Shadow ordered. Jak picked him up and carried Shadow by his shoulder to his ship.When they all reach it, the wasn't a door to be found. Shadow mutterd the word "open" and then and opening appeared, and they walked inside.

Both Jak and Jasmine were amazed by the sight of the ship's interior. It was almost like it was a set from Star Wars or something. There was what looked like the cockpit up front, a gallery of computers on the side, a table in the middle and at the back, in the middle of the two doors labeled "Kitchen" and "Engine Room," was what looked like a tube labeled "MRP."

"That's the device right there," Shadow pointed out, then he used his free arm to take off his helmet. As it hit the floor, Jak and Jasmine were amazed to see that Shadow's face was a 'human' handsome young face. His skin was grayish black, eyes are red, and he was white spiky hair. Minus his skincolor, wings and tail, Shadow was good looking enough to be human. Jasmine face turned red as she couldn't believe that a daemon would look this cute.

They both froze in awe until Shadowed let out a cough, as a blob of blood came from his mouth and hit the floor. Jak rushed him to the MRP as quickly as he could. It took a while but be was able to him in and start the device.
11111122212.title: All aboard the Deathray

111111222122.content:
The device had transformed into a medical chamber where Jak had put Shadow in the chamber.
"Jak...... Thanks to you I will be okay...." Shadow said.
"We owe you for saving us from Nostory." Jak said.
"Listen.....We should rest a while and then continue." Shadow said.
"Ok, We'll wait." Jak said.
Then he left Shadow alone to rest. He looked at Jasmine and said,
"He'll be fine, we should rest though." Jak said.
"Yeah." Jasmine said.
"I liked it better when you were 50-feet-tall......." Jak said.
"What????" Jasmine said.
"Was that out loud??" Jak said.
"You did?" Jasmine said.
111111222122.title: Resting up

1111112221222.content:
Jasmine had a lot going on in her mind. First she work up as a 50-foot tall giant. Then this "Nostory" guy was trying to kill her. Then Shadow came to save the day, and he knew that she could change her size by will before she even discovered that she could. She was thinking that if she was able to shrink herself to normal, could she make herself grow again?

"Hey, Jak." She started to ask. "Is it okay if I step out for some air?"

"Don't see why not," Jak answered back. "That Nostory guy seems to be long gone. Just stay close to the ship."

"I'm not going far," She stated as the ship's door opened to the outside. The city was empty. Everyone must have ran of when Nostory came. Good for her, though. She was going to experiment on her theory and she didn't want to hurt anyone by accident.

Alright, Jasmine thought to herself. Let's try to grow myself back to 50 feet. She then pictured her previous height, then before she knew it, she was growing. Her surroundings shrunk lower and lower as her body rosed higher and higher. It didn't take long for her to reach her previous height.

Looks like it worked. She slightly smiled at this fact Now what can I do now? I could growing bigger for fun, or maybe I could see if I have any other power.
1111112221222.title: Testing her power

choices: Jak comes out to check on Jasmine.
11111122212221.content:
Let's see if I can get any taller. Jasmine thought. She started to picture herself at about 100 feet tall. Then soon she got this tangling feeling. Again, she grew bigger and bigger, now some objects were about microsized.

She was now 100 feet tall.

What happens next?
11111122212221.title: 100 feet tall.

choices: Someone is still  in the city.
111111222122211.content:
Jake decided that he too needed some fresh air and wanted to step out of the ship for awhile. He was surprised to see Jasmine a giantess again and much bigger too. " Hi, shorty." her voice booming down, smiling at him.

" Hey, I'm not short, your just very big." said Jake. " So, what else can you do, besides changing your size?" asked Jake. " Well, apparently I can heal really fast too." She showed Jake her hand. " Nostory stabbed me here. " she pointed to that area with her other hand( duh...). ' But, it looks brand new." said Jak. "exactly, I saw a huge cut where he stabbed but it healed in seconds." said Jasmine.

" Wow, thats good, I don't really have any powers." said Jake. " Don't be sad, you've got me and I'll fill for both of us.", giviing him a kiss. " I liked that." said Jake. " Well, be nice to me and I'll give you more of those." said Jasmine.
111111222122211.title: Jak comes out to check on Jasmine.

1111112221222111.content:
Jak heard a sound coming from the Deathray.
"Sounds like somethings up in there." said Jasmine.
"Yeah, I'll check it out." said Jak.
"What if someone or something is in there?" Jasmine said.
"I doubt that, but if there is, I will scream for help." Jak said.

So with that, he went inside the deathray and he saw the medical chamber. He looked at a meter at the bottom showing how much Shadow had recoved. He was at 100%. Suddenly, the machine opened up, and the door to the chamber opened.

Shadow came out, it looked like he was in top form. He had no wounds, no scatches, nothing. He was clean.

"Thanks again, Jak." Shadow said.
"No problem." Jak said.
"Where's Jasmine?" Shadow said.
"Well, she is outside getting some fresh air." Jak said.

They both looked outside and they didn't see her.

Where is she??
1111112221222111.title: Shadow is Back up and running.

11111122212221112.content:
" Judging by those footprints, she went into the city." said Jak. Shadow's eyes widened with horror as they heard those words. " She musn't go into the city! Theres no telling whats still in there. " he said.

" Why? Whats still in there?" said Jake curiously. " Nostory's daemon hordes swept through the city, wiping out everyone inside. Chances are , he left some behind to report on any incidents occuring. If this is true, Jasmine is in danger." he said.

" Come on then, into the ship Shadow!" said Jak.
11111122212221112.title: Danger

111111222122211122.content:
At a temple far away from Jasmine and her friends, an old man sat on a seat. He was surrounded by two musuclar demons, red skin and wielding maces and wearing a loincloth. Infront of the old man was a pool of dark liquid, shimmering undr the light of the candles.

The old man's eyes were focused on the pool when it suddenly began to move, swirling round and round and then rising up as a vortex before crashing down onto the pool, revealing Nostory, visibly upset.

" You lied to me, old man!" he grabbed the old man's neck with one hand. " Now, now Nostory, I did not lie to you. There was just an unforseeable chink in our plan. Surely you killed the giantess?" he said with a smile. Nostory relaxed his grip." No, she regenerated quickly , whatever I inflicted on her simply healed over. " came the reply.

" It seems that she was indestructible when that boy showed up. He has something that strengthened her. I want you to find it and then destroy it and the giantess. After that, our dream can come true." he said, smiling.

" Do not forget, my master expects to be rewarded generously for lending you his services. He does like to be short changed. "
111111222122211122.title: Whats Nostory doing?

1111112221222111221.content:
Jasmine was wondering around the city at her new size, like a child at a new home, she was taking in the sights and sounds experienced at being a 100 feet tall. She noticed some corpses lying on the ground.

She bent down to take a look and noticed that they had their chests torn open and their heart was missing. She felt like puking and had to get up quickly. She felt sad at the thought of how many people died when Nostory attacked the city.

"I'll make sure Nostory gets what he deserves." she said to herself, clenching her fists. She looked up and saw her reflection in the glass panels of a building. She took time to notice her body. Her chest was larger, more proportionate to her body but large enough to look good. Her legs were long, like a super models while she had a nice flat stomach. "Wow, no wonder Jak seems to be interested in me, I became hotter when I became 50 feet tall." she thought to herself.


Just then, she was interrupted by the Deathray flying through the city and hovering near her face. "Jasmine, we got to get out of here! According to Shadow, there could still be evil in the city." said Jak from the cockpit.

Jasmine stared at them, but turned away when she saw something. Is it good or evil?
1111112221222111221.title: Back to Jak and Jasmine.

11111122212221112211.content:
Jasmine's attention had caught by the sight of several ghouls( Think Warcraft 3) battling a young woman. She was in leather and carried a a curved sword and was hacking away at them but to no avail. The ghouls simply shurgged it off and continued attacking her.

Jasmine knew she had to do something or risk letting the woman die. She charged towards the ghoul, the momentum knocking them over. ( they were about 6 feet in height). The woman was stunned and stepped back as each ghoul was felled by the soles of Jasmine's feet. The woman was blonde with blue eyes and stood around 5' 7"

Jasmine saw the woman and bent down. " Are you ok, miss?" she said. Hearing this, she kneeled down , sword at her side. " Your Highness, I am fine. " said the woman. Jasmine was taken aback by the reply. " Please, don't call me your highness, its so embarassing. What is your name?" she said, blushing. " Kate, Jasmine." this further shocked Jasmine as she had not told her her name. " How do you know my name?" she asked her.


Their attention was diverted by the Deathray landing. Shadow and Jak rushed out. " Who is this?" asked Shadow, a little apprehensive at the sight of the woman. " This is Kate." asaid Jasmine. " Well, tell us all about you when your on the ship, all right?" said Jak.
" Fine by me." said Kate.
11111122212221112211.title: Kate

111111222122211122111.content:
A picture of Nostory ( click the link if it works)http://images.wikia.com/pt.starwars/imag...


On the ship, Jasmine had shrunk down to a manageable height of 5'6 , the same height as Jak. " So tell us about yourself." said Shadow, the four of them sitting at a table with mugs of hot cocoa( Only thing I could imagine them drinking now) . "Who's driving this ship , if your here?" Jak asked Shadow. " Its on Autopilot." said Shadow.

" I'm Kate Breslin from this city." said Kate. " I'm part of a group known as the League of Rebels." said Kate. " Never heard of it." said Jasmine and Jak. " Its a group formed after Nostory and his Daemon horde swept through the country, laying waste to cities. We were actually a series of tiny isolated groups spread out on the continent but we managed to group together though there's still a large group of rebels we haven't contacted. " said Kate.


" Its that bad, huh?" said Jasmine, a little depressd at her current situation. " It gets worse sadly, we discovered Nostory through his spells rendered technology useless. The most advanced stuff you get is flintlock muskets and 15th century cannons. Its quite surprising this ship still works." said Kate. " This ship runs on magic, it grants the ship immunity to spells, Nostory can't break it down with his dark magic." said Shadow.

" So what can you tell me about the invasion , Kate?" said Jak. " It started here actually." said Kate. " Nostory appeared with his army and proceeded to destroy the city. After finishing the city, he'd put dark clouds of magic over the city , to act as a form of transport. He can move armies in a blink of an eye but we managed to counter that , he has to use the souls of the dead to create such clouds , alot thats he kills as many people as he can during an attack. We try to evacuate everyone when we get hold of future attacks" said Kate.

" Tell us more. " said Shadow. " Well, I joined the League of Rebels( LOR) when he attacked New York. My family was wiped out. I felt such grief and anger as I watched him and his daemons murder them and all the civilians. I vowed that day to stop him and his daemons even if it kills me." said Kate.

" Can you tell why I am suddenly 50 feet tall when I woke up?" asked Jasmine.

Does Kate know?
111111222122211122111.title: On the ship...

choices: They have arrived at the outposy
1111112221222111221112.content:
" Sorry, I don't know that one." said Kate. " Perhaps you know someone who does?" asked Jak. " There a LOR outpost about 50 miles from here. There's people there who could explain it to you . " said Kate.

" Thats certainly good news." said Shadow. " Now, if you'll excuse me... Kate come along ,need your help entering coordinates." said Shadow as he went to punch in the coordinates with Kates assisstance. This Jak alone with Jasmine. Jak found it difficult to take his eyes off Jasmine's body as it was unbelieveably attractive. " Ahem, stop staring mister." said Jasmine.

" What? Oh sorry." said Jak.
1111112221222111221112.title: Girl Talk

11111122212221112211121.content:
" So, did you see your folks anywhere when you woke up?" asked Jak. " No, I don't know what happened to them when I woke up. I was already huge, the house was destroyed. I hope they're okay. " said Jasmine, a tear flowing down her cheek as she imagined what the Daemons would to them if they caught them.

" They're probably still alive, they might have escaped when Nostory attacked." said Jak.
" I don't mean to be pessismistic, but unlikely that thy would abandon their daugther like that. Parent's don't do such things." said Shadow, having returned with Kate. " True but seeing you were so big,they might have thought you could fend them off yourself." said Kate.

" Lets talk about something with a little more hope in it. Kate, how can we kill a daemon?" asked Jak. " For topics with hope this isn't one of them." said Kate. " They can be killed like humans but they can respawn in the Netherworld so Nostory has a an endless supply of them. However, to summon them from Earth, you need places like graveyards or a morgue where death is in the air or evil is afoot. " said Kate. " Talk about uplifting, I feel much better now knowing my dead uncle is resting in a Daemon nursery." said Shadow.
11111122212221112211121.title: They talk somemore.

111111222122211122111211.content:
The sword pierced through the LOR infantryman as Nostory decimated a small company of them. His daemon soldiers finished off the rest as he looked up at the sky, overcast, suitable for such a scene of pure carnage. " These humans, don't know when to give up, do they?" he asked rhetorically. He licked the blood off his blood red blade, tasting it. " A little salty but chock full of nutritents." he said as he gazed at the horizon.


" Reanimate the bodies as ghouls. That ought to replenish any lost men." he said, his back turned to the acolytes, small weak men in hoods as they cast their spell over the corpses, converting them into ghouls. He was interrupted as a daemon came up to him, clutching a LOR soldier. " As you requested, High General Nostory, the leader of this company. " he dropped the soldier infront of Nostory, the man lying a heap as he sobbed, hoping to avoid a grisly end. He felt himself being lifted by the collar of his shirt and found him face to face with the High General.

" Tell me about the whereabouts of Jasmine, the one your foolish friends hail as your saviour , the one whom will slay myself and the Daemon Horde. " he said with a dash of anger in his tone. " I-I-I-I d-d-d-d-on't know about her location but I know she's headed for an outpost near the Rockies." he said, stuttering as he knew what was coming.

Suddenly, he felt his airways contract as Nostory used his dark powers on him, to extract his soul and consume it. His body was erect, muscle spasms and pain running though his body until the sou's connection was severed, the body went limp and Nostory felt stronger. " They may have useless bodies, but their souls are delicious." he said.
111111222122211122111211.title: Where is Nostory?

1111112221222111221112111.content:
"Jak and Jasmine were in the ship along with Kate and Shadow. It was getting boring now that they were on the ship with nothing to do. " Do you have any form of entertainment on this ship?" asked Jasmine. " No, except for chess." said Shadow. " No thanks" said Jasmine.

Kate was sitting by a window, looking down, admiring the view. " Its such a beautiful world, just that now Nostory paints it an ugly colour of death and destruction. " she said. " Don't worry, it'll get better once we stop him." said Jak.
1111112221222111221112111.title: Back to our Heroes

11111122212221112211121111.content:
" We're over the outpost now." said Kate. Shadow came over to the window, along with Jasmine and Jak who were curious to see what it looked like. " Alright, I'll land this thing. Everyone grab onto something and hold on for your life." said Shadow from the pilot's room.

Each of the three grabbed onto something and held on for their dear lives as the ship took a sharp dive. The G Forces were intense and Jak felt as though his face was going to be torn off but fortunately, the landed before anyone's body parts were torn off.

The door opened and the quartet stepped out , Jak and Jasmine adimiring the scenery of the Rockies. The outpost only had its entrance visible, a city surrounded by stone walls. There were guards at the gate and archers patrolled the walls, looking out for any daemon trying to enter.

" So how do we enter?" asked Shadow, a little uncomfortable( he's a daemon and the LOR take up a hostile stance against daemons, no matter how cute girls find them). " Jasmine, grow huge. We'll be let in for sure." said Kate.

Jasmine began to foucus on being big and she slowly began to grow. Her body pushed out from all directions, her chest expanding along with her legs and the rest of her body. She stepped at around 200 feet in height. " Wow, I'm bigger than before." said Jasmine, her voice loud and booming. " Why not just have you let us in , then have Jasmine grow huge and scare them?" asked Jak. " Makes it interesting." replied Kate.


The guard at the outpost was dozing off, his helmet tilted as he attempted to catch some sleep but was awaken by rumbling from the ground. He looked up and saw a girl some distance away. How could this be? ,he thought. Thats a few hundred yards away but shes clearly visible.

His thoughts were put aside as he found himself staring at a toe. He looked but Jasmine's face was obscured by her massive chest( C cup by today's standards). He kneeled down and began to kiss her toe. Jasmine retracted her toe in disgust. " Why'd you do that?" she asked him. " I was only trying to please you, Your Highness." said the guard." Well , don't do that, its disgusting . If you want to make me, don't call me Your Highness, call me Jasmine and let myself and my friends in." said Jasmine.

The guard let out a whistle as the gate was raised and Jasmine and her friends were let through. By now, due to Jasmine's vibrations as a 200 foot giantess, a crowd had gathered and all began to kneel down and began to chant her name. " Please , get up , all of you. Call me Jasmine, not Your Highness." said Jasmine. They did so and the crowd made way for a middle-aged man , he was wearing plain clothes and looked pleased to see Kate.

Is there trouble?
11111122212221112211121111.title: Arrived
