Jasmine, as well as Jak was awed; he was still sitting in Jasmine's cleavage.




"Angels?" Jak said. "There are angels out there?"




"Please, let me finish," Lucius asked, then took a shurred feeling at the thought of Shadow with hatred. "The second race is the one Shadow's from, the Daemons. They are beings of darkness, who all have traits of beast, like claws or talons..."







Lucius contined. "The Daemons were under the leadership of the Daemon God, Lucifer. All three races lived in harmony at first. But Lucifer was power-hungry and wanted to rule everything. Thus, came forth was the great war between Gabriel and her angels, who fought to defend the Humans, and the Daemons led by Lucifer. The war was long and bloody, as there was casualties on both sides. The great war would have been decided by the battle between Gabriel and Lucifer. Gabriel herself fought gracefully and magnificence, but Lucifer was devious, dishonest and a damn-right cheat. He used his Daemon hoard to attack Gabriel on all sides while he attacked her in the confusion."





"That's awful!" Jasmine responded in disgust.





"Agreed" Lucius responded. " As her last resort, Gabriel had no choice, but to use all her power to create a alternate realm and send Lucifer and all the Daemons in there, separate from mankind forever. This however, cost Gabriel her life."





"WHAT?" Jasmine screamed in shock. "You mean that she's dead? But what about Lucifer?





"Lucifer died after that, or so I've heard," Lucias answered. "No one truly knew how he died, strangely."





"Anyway," Lucius continued."The great Lord created this Prophecy with his own will and gave the copies to the few High-Angels on this planet while he took the remaining angels to the cosmos with him. He also gave a warning that the Gods Gabriel and Lucifer will be reincarnated, and then the Great War will resume once again."




The two teens then put two and two together. First, he said that only the High-Angels on Earth had the only copies of the Prophecy, and the fact that Lucius has one. "Wait! You're an..." Jasmine started to say.




"I did say that Angels were an almost female race.," Lucius stated out, then golden, birdlike wings appeared on his back. "I'm on of the few male Angels and also a High-Angel."




"That explains why you don't like Shadow that much," Jak said to Lucius. "Now, for the Reincarnation of Lucifer, I'd put all my money on that it's Nostory."




"But," Jasmine started to say, "If there's a reincarnation of Gabril, and she has an unlimited growth rate, then that means..."




"Exactly," Lucius responded...
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Lucias reads the prophecy.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
"You are the Reincarnation of Goddess Gabriel!" Lucius said.


"Me, a goddess? I am just a 14-year-old girl living her life." Jamsine said. "Until now....I guess." Jasmine said. It finally all made sense to her now. Why everyone would bow down to her, and address her as Goddess, and that's possibly why Nostory was after her...but why was he after Jak...?


"Wow, I am friends with a Goddess!!!! Heck! I am in her boobs!" Jak said, blushing afterwards.


"Yes. So you wanted to know where Nostory is, right?" Lucius said.


"Yes." Jasmine said.


"Well, Just go west from here, 20 miles." Lucius said.


"Good. Ready to go save our friends?" Jasmine said.


"Yes, Goddess Jasmine." Jak said.


"Keep it at Jasmine." Jasmine said. "If we get back in the Deathray, I have a little game for you."


"See ya, Lucius. We will report here after we get the allies back here." Jak said.


"Ok then. We will root for you." Lucius said.





Jasmine, who now grew a bit more, and Jak, was on their way to save Kate and Shadow, Due to Jasmine's 400 foot height, it wouldn't take them long to Nostory's Lair.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Jasmine is a Goddess!

choices: They sneak them out in a nice and timely manner...
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
The badly beaten Shadow, and Kate were back in a cell together. Shadow has hurt, but was healing slowly.




"Shadow, I am glad to see you are healing." Kate said. "Your ability to regenerate is amazing.."


"Yeah......" Shadow said. "Wait a sec. I sense something." Shadow sensed a huge power coming their way, but it wasn't a Deamon...


"I think I hear Jasmine coming." Kate said, "She must have her powers back. Good."


"Yeah.....She must gotten the infomation from LOR to get here." Shadow said. "She's starting to develop her powers greatly..."


"Hopefully they get us out in a sneaky manner." Kate said.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: To Shadow and Kate.

choices: The Head to the Deathray Quickly.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Suddenly, the walls of their cell started to collpase and a giant hand reached out to them and opened it up to carry Shadow and Kate.




"Jamsine!!!!!" Kate said.


"Good, you guys came to save us." Shadow said. "Can you get these chains off of me?"


"Sure," Jasmine said, as she pulled the chains off effortlessly.


"We walked for hours to LOR." Jasmine said.


"Note that Nostory drugged her, and she almost killed me." Jak said. 'It also cut off her powers for a while."


"I see." Shadow said.


"I am a goddess!" Jasmine said.


"Wha-" Shadow and Kate started to say.


"We will explain later." Jak said. "Right now, we need to get out of here."


"OK." Kate said.


And Jasmine held them in her hand (cept' Jak who was in her clevage.)
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Shadow and Kate: SAVED!

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
At the Deathray, Shadow was attending to his wounds as well as Kates while Jasmine was outside playing with Jak at her new height of 400 feet. " Better run Jak, I'm gonna step on you!" she said playfully, Jak dodging her footfalls.





" Careful, this gorund is not stable, its earthquake, your weight may trigger an earthquake or something." said Shadow. Jasmine picked up Jak and set him in her hand." What do you say we go inside and think of what to do next?" said Jasmine.





" Ok." said Jak. Jasmine shrank down to a suitable height and went inside with Jak. Shadow followed suit, his body covered in bandages. In the bushes, Seth( from some chapters back) watched, pondering his next move.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: To the DeathRay.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
'I can never forgive you! Not since that day....' Seth was in his thoughts.

Shadow, Seth, and Lylithe, another deamon who worked with the two. The trio was a group who did bounties, for currency. They all worked together and were hired for many missions, which varied from recon to combat. Their services were always available and reliable. The relationship between the three were tight-knit and they seemed very inseparable. Nothing seemed to weigh them or their teamwork down. Many would think there was a rivalry between Seth and Shadow over Lylithe, but there was no such thing.

One day, the three were sent off to a temple to recover a jewel for Nostory. The reasons for the collection of this item was unknown, but the trio agreed to get this. As they were walking, Seth noticed was his partners were oddly silent, and not as talkative as usual. As they approached the temple, a stone door opened before them, and they entered.

The air felt cool, and there was a dense fog in the air...

"Be careful guys." Shadow warned, "It seems we will encounter some-"

"Lookout!" Lylithe said, firing a energy blast past Shadow and hitting a stone minion.

"I'll handle this guy!" Seth said, charging at him.

Seth crashed into the enemy blasting toward another room. "You guys go and find the jewel. I'll take care of him!"

Shadow and Lylithe pressed on, going deeper into the temple. Seth remained behind. As they were walking, they noticed that there was a purple glow on the wall, and they assumed that it was the jewel. They both dashed towards the glow and reached a lower level. Lylithe grabbed the jewel and felt a power go through her.

"This power...." Lylithe said. "This is the power Nostory was telling me about...it feels good."

"You didn't tell us about this!?" Shadow said. "You knew!"

"That's right." Lylithe replied. "I'm going to join forces with Nostory...Deamons are the superior race."

"You don't have to do this!" Shadow said, his dark aura flowing. "We all have to live in peace."

Suddenly, out of nowhere Lylithe was transformed into a beast, the jewel's power proving to be too much for her. Shadow charged at his former partner who was now transformed into a monster. Shadow, dashed toward her, firing a blast at the jewel, which appeared on her chest. Lylithe roared in pain, and Shadow realized that was the spot he had to keep targeting. He saw a broken sword on the ground and decided that was all he needed to help him defeat his friend.

Meanwhile, Seth had just finished off the stone beast and rushed as he heard the sounds of the battle below. Seth dashed, but to only see Shadow pulling a blade out of Lylithe, who was almost covered in all scratches and blood. Shadow crushed the jewel and turned to see Seth, who was shocked.

"Shadow, how could you!?" Seth said, charging.

"No wait-" Shadow tried to explain, but was attacked by Seth, as he was flanked by a barrage of blasts.

"I'll kill you!" Seth cried.

The battle raged on, with both Shadow and Seth exchanging heavy blows, as the battle was bloody. Both fought hard but Shadow didn't want to kill his friend. Once Shadow hit Seth with a kick, the enraged Deamon was hanging from a cliff ledge. Shadow tried to save his friend, as Seth didn't have the strength to pull himself up. He let himself fall, vanishing. Both Deamons were heavily wounded.

Since then, Seth joined Nostory, due the the same beliefs and ideals about their races being dominant. Seth brought in heavily, and despite his history with Shadow, he felt that Nostory fit him better as a friend as they wanted to be strong and powerful.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Seth's Past explained.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Seth had ultimately decided to let Shadow heal first, let alone fight him at 100%. He wanted to give Shadow his pain, sorrow, and anger that was bottled up inside him for years. Also, he wanted Nostory to see Shadow die too. Seth had decided to report to Nostory and tell that Jasmine and Jak saved Kate and Shadow.



Seth joined Nostory after that fatal day. Nostory wanted power and had allowed Seth to be partners with him. This is what changed Seth. Anger. Pain. Sorrow. These are the words that wrapped around Seth's head when he killed people and other beings with Nostory. It made him feel good. These things allowed Seth mind to be corrupted. He become as worse as Nostory.

He just decided to continue to wait and let things play out, so he could mess with Jasmine's growth abilities.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Seth's keeps it quiet.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Boarding the Deathray, our heroes began to prepare to take off. Shadow started manning the control helm and checked the gauges and readouts. Since she had nothing to do, Kate started to clean up and dust around the bridge. Jak went to grab a couple of sodas from Shadow's fridge (some of Shadow's stuff were magically enhanced to function by magic instead of electricity, remember?) for him and Jasmine. As he came back and handed her the pop, he saw that Jasmine hasn't completely returned to her original size. She was about 7 feet tall, her head was close to reaching the ceiling, and she completely dwarfs Jak.



"Jas, aren't you a little -too- tall?" Jak asked her.



"Well, it's kinda funny," Jasmine giggled out. With all my size changing, I, uh, forgot my original height."



"You were 4-foot-11." Shadowed softly stated. "Now stop abusing your powers and return to normal." Disappointed, Jasmine shrunk back down to her original.



"Come on. I was just having some fun," she spoke. At the meantime, Kate found a pendent while dusting. It almost looked like an eye, bronze covering with a emerald encrusted and a black 'pupal,' slitted to look like a cat's eye.



"You know very well that your powers use up a lot of your stamina, tiring you out," Shadow started to lecture Jasmine, while Kate opened the pendent. "Using it too long without rest could leave you completely defen..."



"SETH!!!" Kate blurted out in shock. Jak and Jasmine instantly bolted to see why she screamed. Looking over her shoulder, they see a picture of three people in it, looking like buddies. They see Shadow in there, a little younger than he is now, and in the middle was what looked like a catgirl, like the kinds Jak and Jasmine would see in Animes. What made Kate scream was the familiar blue face.



"No way!!!" They both were shocked to see Seth in this picture. All three of the Daemons looked like real good friends, with matching uniforms, showing that they seemed to be in the same business. While all three Jak, Jas, and Kate couldn't believe it, Shadow snatched the pendent from them.



"Who said that you could touch this?" Shadow hissed.



"Hold on!" Jak started to ask. "You mean that..."



Me and Seth were friends, and partner bounty hunters, I'll admit." Shadow told the three. "At least, until 7 years ago." he ducked his head, drowned with shame and pain.



"What about the catgirl?" Jasmine asked. "She seems cute."



"Her name was Lylithe," Shadow moaned, "And she was killed at the same 7 years."



"I got it!" Jak blurted out. "Both you and Seth had the hots for her right? and she loved you more than him, which made him jealous, right? So he figured that he can't have her, no one can, and he killed her, right?"



"SHUT UP JAK!" Shadow then burst out of anger. "Must everything seem like a joke you have to say?" He them bowed his head again. "Besides, he would never harm her."



"Man, I'm sorry," Jak apologized. "Not trying to joke, but was it Nostory?"



"He did have some responsibility for this," Shadow said, then almost started to cry. "But the one who was responsible for it, whose hands were stained by her blood, and who Seth hates for killing Lylithe..." He then broke to tears and collapsed to the floor. "IT WAS ME! I WAS THE ONE WHO KILLED LYLITHE!!!" The others gasped at this.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: A dark secret...

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
"I had to do it," Shadow said, standing up and wiped his tears away. "7 years ago...."



"Me, Seth, and Lylithe were partners and were good friends. We were some of the Deamons in the world who were good. We all known each other since we were kids. Causing pranks and cracking jokes were all we did when we were young. We were bounty hunters, who hunted for any thing that would disturb people. Nostory was our best client. He would pay us big money each time we did jobs for him. Until one day, Nostory sent us on a mission in Denzar Woods. It was a violent rainstorm. He wanted us to do something in the woods, but he wouldn't tell us. We three split had up. As I was dashing through the Denzar Woods. I spotted Nostory and Lylithe. I listened in on their talk......"



'Lylithe. You have done well to gain the trust of Seth and Shadow. Just make sure they don't suspect anything. You know you have a power to be unleashed. Once we unlock your power. We shall rule the world.'



'Yes. Those two think I am really their friend. Ha! Once we are powerful, we will be able to shape our world. With my power and your power we will be unstoppable! I was the granddaughter of Lucfier, the great evil Deamon that lived.'



"I was shocked to hear this. I know I had to do one thing to do. And that was to kill Lylithe. I didn't want to tell Seth. Who knows what they would have done. So I engaged in battle with Lylithe. She was playing innocent, but she told me that Nostory have been planning to make the Deamons a race to rule. Soon after, I killed her. This is when Seth comes in....



'Shadow! How could YOU!?' Seth was enraged when he saw Lylithe killed by me. I tried to explain, but he was too mad and angry to listen to me. We had gotten into a battle that gotten so servere it become a battle to the death. He seemed to want to kill me. I dodged a charge from him to have hanging from a cliff. Our powers ended up becoming weak enough due to our stamina, so we couldn't fly. I reached out to his hand, but he didn't take it, and he went into the darkness."



"That's what happened." Shadow said. "When I saw him working with Nostory, I knew it was too late to save him."



Jak, Jasmine, and Kate were stunned. They were stunned and they were suprised at his story.



"....Shadow. That was the past, this is now. I know you wish you can go back and fix things, but you can't. I feel your pain. But we can fix now. We will be able to make sure Nostory doesn't become like Lucfier." Jak said. "That's a promise."



"Jak...." Shadow said. "Thanks.... You have been a good friend."





"We won't let Nostory get power. We won't." Jak said. "It's on us to stop him!"

"You're right Jak, I can't change the past, but I can make sure the future remains intact!" Shadow replied.

"Let's rest." Kate suggested. "After today's event's I'm sure we are all exhausted."

And with that, the crazy day has ended for the Heroes, as they hope to be able to stop Nostory and Seth...

But that doesn't mean that Villains take a break...
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Shadow’s tale of the tape.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Seth was still staking out near the spot where the Deathray was. Night had fallen. Seth assumed that they were sleep, since it was late. Seth did, however had to sneak through the ship. When he walked through, he saw Shadow floating in the Medical Chamber, with a breathing mask on, resting. He so wanted to grab him and kill him now, but he had to stay on task.



He went into Jasmine's sleeping quarters, and sure enough, Jak was sleeping with her. He was snuggled in her clevage. Way down in there. He was lucky that he was out of sight. Seth might have squished him right there. Anyway, he went toward Jasmine, and stuck the syringe in her neck. He did this carefully, not sticking it in forcefully and doing it softly, so the sleeping teen wouldn't wake up.



The drugs would effect Jasmine in the morning. Seth went back the way he came. He took a look at Shadow again. He looked down at the healing meter. He was at 100%. He could have stopped the meter, but he wanted to give Shadow full pain to the max, and at least have a good fight with him, as they were former friends.



Seth left the Deathray, and headed back to the lair, their plan was in action. Jasmine had no clue on what was to come. However tomorrow's events was to be chaotic.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Later on at night...

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
The next morning, our heroes woke up. Jak woke up inside Jasmine's bra. Not being a pervert, he moved up to surface. Jasmine woke up shortly after. She went outside and grew Jak to normal size. Shadow who was in the medical chamber, woke up and stepped out of it, feeling refreshed. Kate was awake and was looking on the radar to see what was going on. Jasmine helped herself to some food, Jak, Shadow, and Kate joined them. It seemed to be a slow, quiet morning. Soon, Jasmine started to feel the effects of the drug. Jasmine's troubles started.



"Er... Jasmine, why are you growing in the ship?" Jak said.


"I'm not- wait a minute, I am not doing that." Jasmine said.


"Someone," Shadow quickly realized the danger. "Drugged you last night."


"Jasmine, you should get out the ship." Kate said.


"That would be-" Jasmine started, but her head hit the celling and she started to expand. She ran out of the ship in a hurry.



She grew to an uncontrollable height, and it was massive, and she grew to mega size. Jak just stared. He knew Jasmine wouldn't grow that tall. She can't interact with her friends this way. She was around 1,500 feet tall.



"Guys!" Jasmine said. "Where are you?"


"What we do?" Jak said. "Things might appear super micro sized to her."


"Well," Shadow said. "We might as well get in the Deathray and fly up to her."



Jasmine started to walk away from the group, her steps making a huge impact on the ground. The heroes started to get in the ship and try and stop her, but Nostory and Seth punched all three heroes to cause a huge knock-back. Shadow had stopped flying through the air and recovered Jak and Kate from the impact. He pressed a button to send the Deathray into orbit until needed. Shadow landed on the ground with both Jak and Kate in his hand.



"Do we have to fight again?" Kate said.


"Yes. Jak, you need to learn how to fight, hate to say it but you're a weak link." Shadow said.


"Here, Jak use this." Kate said. She handed him a plasma pistol.


"Here we go...." Jak said, getting the pistol loaded.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: The Very Next Day....

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Nostory and Seth were heading to the spot where the heroes landed.


"I can't wait to dispose of Shadow and Kate." Nostory said. "Nice work, Seth."


"Thanks," Seth said, "I can't wait to kill Shadow with my own two hands."


"After we take care of the pests, we should be able to kill Jasmine." Nostory said.



The heroes were soon being charged at. Kate readied her blade, while Shadow stayed in his regular form. Jak was hiding. He know he couldn't do much, but he was ready take a shot at Seth or Nostory, the one being important was Nostory. He could have just shot away at them, but Kate told him that the pistol had a charge shot and it could severely weaken a Deamon. He had 8 shots at the two Deamons. It held 80 bullets, and since the charge shot needed 10 bullets, he had 8 chances to hold off Nostory and have him retreat.



Nostory and Seth was floating in the air. They were looking down at Kate who was in a stance with her blade, and Shadow who stood tall and looking up at the two Villains.



"Heh." Nostory said. "Ready for the next fight?"


"You shouldn't be too confident," Kate said. "After losing to us at the compound."


"Well, you had the girl backing you up." Nostory said. "I didn't expect her to try hard as she did. But it seems that she won't be a factor in this battle now."


"Seth...." Shadow said. "You won't listen to me about what happened to Lylithe. And now here we are. After 7 years, I expect that you have increased in power."


"I wouldn't push it," Seth said, smiling. "I think I'll be able to show you what I had to endure. Lylithe doesn't matter now that's she's gone."


"I don't expect any less out of both you." Shadow said.


"Where's the boy?" Nostory said.


"Forget about him," Shadow said. "Let's do this thing."



And the battle commenced. Shadow took a jump towards Seth, and started to fight in the air. Kate jumped toward and made a slash attempt toward Nostory, who parried the strike with his own katana. Shadow and Seth were brawling it out. Shadow threw a punch toward Seth, who blocked it, and followed it up with a counter. Shadow blocked it too. Then, he dealt a kick toward Seth, who got hit in the stomach. Seth took the pain, but didn't flench. Meanwhile, Nostory was on the defense, blocking rapid fast strikes from Kate. He was blocking them, but was dealt a fast, swift flying drop kick from Kate. He took damage from this. Jak was charging a shot. He was starting to charge a shot. It took time, but it was ready. He fired a shot toward Nostory, who dodged it. Nostory knew it wasn't from Kate. He assumed that Shadow tried to fire a energy beam toward him. The blast flew in the direction Jasmine was in, who was still looking for her teammates. It hit her, and didn't notice it. It didn't hurt her, due to her huge size. Jak had 7 shots left. The battle passed on for 2 hours, nonstop. Shadow and Seth had pushed each to their limits again. Kate and Nostory dealt each other cuts and bruises the whole time. Jak had one shot left. He missed that others. He knew that this was a vital one now. And Jasmine had felt these shots and turned around, she took small, baby steps toward the battle. Seth had shot a energy wave, and so did Shadow. The two blasts collided and exploded. Seth and Shadow were running on fumes now. The two were on the ground, both bleeding and bruised. Nostory and Kate was still going, but stabbed each other at the same time, cutting a vital wound in each other. The fighters were on the ground and started dragging toward each other's side. Jak knew this was his shot. Nothing could mess this up. As soon he shot the plasma pistol, an impact on the ground hit, due the Jasmine walking around. It messed up the shot. Jak knew he messed up. He screwed up. He ran out, and tried to punch Nostory and a brief white flash was seen in Jak's clinched fist as he charged at the Deamon, but was dealt a small energy blast by Seth, who managed to pull it out of his remaining power. Nostory summoned a portal with his remaining power. Him and Seth vanished in it. Jak ended up like Kate and Shadow. It was matter of time that if they weren't healed or saved, they would die.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: A Brawl.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Jak, Shadow, and Kate were still on the ground from that fatal battle. Jak was trying to drag him self toward Shadow. Shadow had gotten the worst of it. He had another battle to the death with Seth. Shadow was also sick of being injured every day. If he survived, he thought, he would start intense personal training. Kate was also hurt severely. Jak was trying to help his friends in anyway, but being merely human, he knew that a blast of any sort would hurt him a lot. He then also wondered why Seth just didn't kill him right there and then. Was Seth too weak to give him a full power blast? It didn't matter, as Jak was hurt and they all really needed to get healed.


"Jak..." Shadow said, weakly. "You remember (cough) the sleeve?"


"Yeah..." Jak said. "Red button...(cough)"


"What's is it (cough) for?" Kate said.


"The Deathray will (cough) be here shortly...." Shadow said.



The Deathray arrived in front of the fallen heroes.


"We have to...(cough) get....to the Medical Chambers." Shadow said. "I have about 6."


"That's...(cough)....great." Kate said.


"Guess this is (cough) what death feels like.. (cough) huh? Well, hopefully we can get to the chambers..." Jak said.



The vision of the fallen heroes started to get blurry, as if they were going to be knocked out. They had crawled into the ship. Shadow was glad that he put the medical room near the entrance of the ship. He had pressed a button to have the medical chambers set up. However, the three heroes were starting to pass out. Shadow was the first one to be knocked out. Kate let out a cry for Shadow, but was short and she was KOed. Jak looked around behind him, and his eyes closed slowly. The last thing Jak seen was a giant girl who was starting to bend down........
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Is this it?

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Jak woke up inside a green liquid. He looked on the side on both sides of him. He saw Kate and Shadow next to him, still sleeping. He felt fully healed. He stepped out of the medical chamber. He wondered, who saved them? He looked at both monitors of Kate and Shadow's recovery percentage. Both were at 75%. Jak went outside. He looked outside. He bumped into a girl, a giant girl at the least. She was laying down, on her stomach, looking at Jak. She had long, black hair, blue eyes, and wore a T-Shirt that covered her chest well. Jak couldn't believe it, as they managed to survive. Jasmine had sat her palm on the ground so that Jak could talk to her. Her giant eyes gazed at Jak, and she leaned her ear so Jak could speak.


"Jasmine, you saved us. But how?" Jak said.


"I couldn't shrink and I still can not shrink." Jasmine said, softly. "Anyway. I bent down and used my pinkie finger to sit you guys inside the med chambers. It took a little fumbling, but I managed to get you guys saved."


"So that's how it happened." Shadow said, walking out of the ship. "You sure know how to adjust."


"Jasmine, you saved our lives." Kate said, not far behind from Shadow.


"Jasmine! Here's an antidote." said a voice from above.


"Sir! You are one of the remaining High-Angels?" Kate said, shocked at seeing her commander.


"Well, yes." Lucius said, flapping his wings. "I'm sorry I didn't reveal this to you sooner Kate. But the kids found out when they came to inquire about the prophecy, as they needed to find you guys. I saw the trouble from the base and quickly made my way here to help Jasmine out."


"If I can ask, do you hate me still?" Shadow said.


"You, No. The rest of the Deamon race, yes." Lucius said. "You have proven your self to be pure of good. I sense no evil out of you Shadow. However, you guys need to continue your journey to stop Nostory."



He disappeared without another word.



Jasmine held the drink in her hand. She gulped it down.


"I don't feel any different." Jasmine said.


"Try shrinking." Shadow said.



Jasmine focused on shrinking to 5'7. She was back.



"I am back guys, and in control of my powers again!" Jasmine said.


"Good." Jak said.



Kate saw on Shadow's screen that a message came from Nostory.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Everything's A-OK!

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
"Guys, I hate to break up this happy moment but we got a transmission from Nostory!" Kate said.

"I wonder what that jerk wants." Jak said.


"Well, he wouldn't back off like this, so let's see what's going on." Shadow said.

Kate started the transmission.


"Hello there my rivals." Nostory started. "I am sending this message to inform you that I have some news. This world is none other but a different world from the real world." This confused the group. "I am working on a portal. A portal to the real world. Jak, you are the source that has led me to the real world. Somehow, you dreamed up this mystical world that existed in the real world long ago. The world was separated from your reality. Now, you are the one who was able to give me an idea to get to your world and bring this world to reality again. This would make our worlds one again. So what I am saying is....This is a feeble dream, but soon to become reality. Everything that has happened, people that you met, and dangers you faced, will be real."

Jak was baffled.

"That's right Jak. Now you know why I was after you specifically. Yes, the girl is important, but you're that dreamer who would allow both Angels and Deamons to exist in the real world once more, as my race was banished by Gabriel...but yet, we're still here. And you have given us another chance to do what Deamons should have done. Dominate. I will bring us back on top and you won't be able to stop me...til then Jak..."

The transmission feed ended.

"I don't believe this." Shadow said. "I know about why we've been banished to this reality...but Kate...if you're human, why aren't you in Jak and Jasmine's world?"

"That's a good question..." Kate said.

Lucius appeared before them again. "That's because your not completely human, Kate."

"I'm not?"

"No." The high angel continued to explain. "In fact, LOR is full of angels and some human-hybrids. You are one of the few. In fact, your mother was an angel and fought in the great war. She also met your father, who was one of the earliest humans in existence, and that's how you were born. Now to add on, we've been stuck in limbo since Goddess Gabriel sacrificed her life to banish the Deamon race, and the rest of the angels went to this limbo reality to ensure that Deamons would be kept in check."

"So...that explains a lot..." Jasmine said. "Isn't tha-"

A door closed and Jak was nowhere to be found.

"I'll speak with you all later." Lucius said, again vanishing.

"Jak?" Jasmine went to go look for Jak.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Questions and More Questions?

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Nostory was healing, but not quite up to 100 percent. Him and Seth were looking into a crystal ball, looking at the Heroes. He was still prepping the portal to the real world.

"Seth, I think that it's time for you to move out." Nostory said.


"I agree," Seth replied, "But I just got an idea."


"Your ideas are always top class, succeed or fail, you have great ideas." Nostory said.


"I think that we should get Jak and hold him prisoner until the portal is ready." Seth said. "You can then forumate a way


"The idea has merit." Nostory said, smiling. "We must keep him here until I finish the portal. But we must let the boy wake up."


"Why?" Seth said.


"We can't enter it with him in this world," Nostory said. "It will take a year before we can go through it. Which means the war will stop as a truce for a year. But we will continue the war in the real world. In the meantime, we should be getting ready, with Jak and Jasmine not being here."


"I see. So we must not wake Jak before the portal is ready." Seth said. "I will take this assmbled team, and raid them. I will snatch Jak in the chaos.


"Good." Nostory said, smiling through his mask.



Seth and the Daemon marauders went to raid the Heroes.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Meanwhile, with the Two Deamons...

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Jasmine walked outside to talk with Jak, who was started to walk in a swamp like area, but was quickly stopped by Jasmine.

"Jak!" Jasmine said, "Wait!"

Jak turned around. "Why should I? This is nothing but a dream! Nothing matters, you're not even real!"

"Jak please, you don't understand, those moments we shared were-"

"Nothing."

"You can't say that." Jasmine started to tear up a bit. "Those moments were real to me. Regardless of what you think, I actually like you Jak. You're the reason I've kept going. I want to protect you and be by your side. Nostory wants to kill you and I dont want that. I care about you. This is real.

"Jasmine. I don't believe you." Jak said, without hesitation. "My brain is probably telling me what I want to hear to make myself feel better. Maybe one day, I can reveal my feelings to the real Jasmine and not a fake dream version. And apparently I have a thing for giant women. But I'm going to go for a walk, and please leave me alone for the time being."

Jak walked away, and Jasmine watched him. Tears streamed down her face slowly and then she said quietly "Y-You don't understand. You're a great guy and I like you a lot. That night we had...it was special." The teenage goddess started to walk back to the Deathray.


Jak stopped near a tree and started to stomp in anger. He was very frustrated and just wanted to wake-up. However, Seth was lurking nearby and quickly contained Jak in a large dark field. Jak was taken off guard and was trying to punch out of his prison, but nothing worked.

"Seth!" Jak said.

"That's right, boy!" Seth said.

"What do you want with me?"

"You will find out soon."

"You all, raid the Deathray." Seth said. "Make them know of Jak's current situation." Seth waved his hand to signal the attack and the Deamon squad went to attack. Seth then opened a portal and went through it. The force field seemed to follow, going into the portal as well.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Jak's disbelief and Jasmine's sadness.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Meanwhile, the mini-Deamon army that Seth sent were attacking Jasmine, Kate and Shadow. These Deamons weren't as strong as Nostory or Seth, but they could take damage.

"Where did these Deamons come from?" Jasmine said, at 20 feet tall, kicking them away from the group. "They're literally everywhere!"

"Nostory or Seth may have sent them here." Shadow said, while blacking and dodging some of the attacks. "These are the big guys. I wonder if they did it to wear us down farther after the battle we had."

"Jak!" Jasmine said.

"Where is he?" Kate said. "We saw you come back in, but we meant to ask; where's Jak?" Kate then sliced a deamon's head off with her Katana.

"He walked into a swamp, saying that I wasn't real and what I said didn't matter..." Jasmine then punted a deamon far away as she said that last part. "And then he wanted to be left alone, and just walked away from me...as if I didn't matter to him."

"He must have been really upset. And what's bad is that Nostory could have captured him, which isn't good at all. Lucius even said Jak is important in the scheme of all of this, but he never told why." Shadow said shooting a large blast at a group of Deamons.

"At this rate, they'll never stop!" Kate said, while quickly slashing through a few deamons and clearing herself some breathing room.

"I'll end this." Shadow said.

"What?" Jasmine said. "How?"

"I've been working on some moves." Shadow said. "Watch this...and get back."

"You sure?" Kate said. "These guys seem like a lot to handle."

"Trust me." Shadow said his purple aura surrounding him.

Jasmine and Kate got in the Deathray, and took off. They went away from the area. Shadow had encased himself inside a dark purple colored ball. He spun around in it, creating a huge energy radius. The range of the blast was miscalculated by Shadow and Kate had to activate the thrusters to gain some extra speed to get away. The dust settled and there was only a large crater and Shadow was in the middle of all of it. Kate then landed the ship back near Shadow. Her and Jasmine were amazed and stepped out of the ship.


"Wow."

"Wow."

"Yeah, I have been trying get more powerful." Shadow said. "But I am sure Nostory and Seth come up with some moves like this one."

"Next time...make sure you get the range right." Jasmine said.

"We had to move a little bit.." Kate said. "Anyway's let's head out to find Jak."
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Meanwhile....

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Seth had arrived with Jak, who was still struggling to get out of the energy ball. He was sent immediately to Nostory, who was almost finished making the portal.

"Nostory, I have gotten the boy." Seth said, "Do as you please with him, I'll keep an eye on the others."

"Good. Now, Jak... You have been a huge help to us these past few days." Nostory said.

"Whatever, do you realize I don't care at this point?" Jak said. "You think it matters? This is nothing but a dream, and I'm just waiting when I wake up from this nightmare."

"Don't you understand Jak? You would have woke up by now if this was an ordinary dream. This is very much real, you're the reason that this is possible! Before then, the angels and deamons we're really fighting for no reason. Although we were banished to this realm stuck in limbo, there was a legend that said; 'The Great War will begin anew, and a dreamer will be the precursor to the chaos.' And guess who that is? You. Jak if it wasn't for you, this chance wouldn't have come. But that's not only it. I also need to you for another purpose...but that will be revealed when the time comes."

Nostory then waved his hand.

The energy ball diminished from Jak. He started to make to run toward Nostory. But it was short lived, as Nostory stopped Jak and used telekinesis to stop him and float him in mid-air.

"You seriously tried to attack me again?" Nostory laughed. "The legend did say the dreamer was brave and could possibly pose a challenge; but you're just kidding yourself."

"How long you are keeping me?" Jak said.

"Until your friends get here." Nostory said. "If they take too long. I'll teleport them here."

"Nostory!" Seth said, turning to him wide-eyed. "They...took out the army, most in one blow. I also felt Shadow's power."

Nostory looked up. "I sensed it too. His power has grown since our last battle. Seems like he's been training. He may be even stronger than you my friend."

Seth was shocked. "His power now exceeds my own?"

"Yes." Nostory said. "I think we should start training as soon as we make our guests depart this world."

Jak was sitting in the cell, thinking about of what was to come. He still couldn't get over this reality. He couldn't wait to get out of this cell. He did feel bad about yelling at Jasmine. He refused to believe that all of this was real. But he couldn't help thinking about Jasmine, especially what she said before he left her.

"Those moments were real to me. Regardless of what you think, I actually like you Jak. You're the reason I've kept going. I want to protect you and be by your side. Nostory wants to kill you and I don't want that. I care about you. This is real."

"Jak," Nostory said. "The portal is near completion."


"And why are you telling me this?" Jak said, snapping out of his thoughts.


"Just giving you a heads up, boy." Nostory said. "I was suprised that you came at me twice."


"Well, that shows I really, really, hate you with a passion." Jak said.


"I could have killed you in this dream-" Nostory was stopped.

"Shut up." Jak said. "Don't say that word. That's the last word I want to hear right now. Dream."

"Nostory, they're heading this way, what is our next move?" Seth said.

Nostory's smile shined through his mask. "Simple. Greet our guests and bring them here. We have some things to talk over."
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Jak: the dreamer of legend?

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Jasmine was 200 feet, and the Deathray was following her like a little fly. Soon, they arrived to the front of the lair. The first thing they saw was Seth, who was standing there. Shadow and Kate had activated the weapons, just in case he was going to destroy the ship.

Seth motioned them to talk, and didn't seem to be in a fighting stance. Kate and Shadow looked at each and was unsure about the whole thing. Jasmine was still staying at her giant height and waited to see what the next move was. Shadow had activated the Deathrays microphone to speak to Seth

"Ok, what's the big idea?" Shadow said, him and his allies standing a few feet from Seth.

"Nothing, it's just that we don't want a raid on our lair." Seth said.

"So," Jasmine said. "You're not going to fight us?"

"No. Not now. We need to talk, and also we have Jak." Seth said. "Follow me if you want to."

Shadow deactivated the microphone and Kate started to question the somewhat weird offer.

"I don't know, guys." Kate said. "It could be a trap."

"Let's gamble it." Shadow said.

"Are you nuts?!" Jasmine said, hearing what Shadow just said.

"Listen, If we destroy this place, we might kill Jak." Shadow said.

"Good point." Kate said.

"Fine...." Jasmine said, shrinking back to 4'11, her normal height.

Shadow and Kate had also landed and got out of the Deathray.

"Ok, Seth." Shadow said. "Lead the way."

"Good." Seth said. "Shall we?"
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Seth greets the Heroes.

choices: But Wait, there's one more chapter.
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Seth and the Heroes were teleported to the top of the lair's tower. Nostory had gave Seth and nodded slowly.

"Hello, my dear enemies." Nostory said. "And thank you Seth for bringing our guests here."

"Where is Jak?!" Jasmine said. "You had better not hurt him!"

"He's behind me. and unharmed." Nostory said, stepping to the side. He teleported Jak from his prison cage, and up to the top of the tower as well. Jak went past Nostory and ran over to friends.

"Jasmine!" Jak said. "I am sorry I yelled at you...even if this is a dream or not, I shouldn't have lashed out at you the way I did. I should have just-

"It's Ok, I understand why." Jasmine said. "Me and you being a couple and all this crazyness, it does seem unreal. I forgive you."

"Nice to have you back. You have been a good friend Jak. I can't leave you behind after all the things we all endured as a team." Shadow said.

"Yeah." Kate said. "You are a fun loving guy who enjoys life, someone can make some people's bad day turn into a good one. You know how to cheer someone up. We wouldn't ever forget you."

"Kate, I have a deal that you might be interested in." said the voice of Nostory.

"What is it...?" Kate said.

"I have a truce in mind. We agree to stay away from the whole group of L.O.R., and you must do the same. You might ask why I am I giving a truce? Well, the truce is temporary, for about 1 year. I can't tell you why I am doing it for me, but for you guys, you have a year to prepare to go to war again. This both gives us time to make new things, and so on. Do we have a Deal?"

"Sure." Kate said, she knew that this would be fine with Lucius.

"Now," Nostory said. He opened the portal to the real world. "Jak and Jasmine can only enter."

"Well." Jak said. "I guess it's time to go."

"Yeah." Shadow said. "It's been a blast. Jak, take care of yourself. So, we will meet again. Hopefully, you will learn how to defend yourself one way or another. Jasmine, you have to go into the portal too. Come here so I can say good-bye to you."

Jak went up near the portal and waited for Jasmine while she talked with Shadow and Nostory who had walked near them

"In about a year's time, we'll be entering the real world." Nostory said. "You'll retain all of your abilities goddess. Thought I'd share that with you." Nostory then walked away.

"Nostory's right. This is indeed real. You have to make Jak aware of that." Shadow explained. "He doesn't seem sure and may wave this all off as a dream. Convince him. You will remember this, I'm sure. You're Goddess Gabriel. The Great War that Lucius described started with Jak and you as well. Good luck.

"Got it." Jasmine said. "Bye Shadow." She gave the kind deamon a hug.

Jak just got done talking to Kate about things and saying good-bye. He was ready to go, but he was waiting to say good-bye to the dream Jasmine. Jasmine soon got done talking with Kate and said her good byes. Then Jasmine walked up to Jak. Jak was blushing like he did when he saw in class. Jasmine smiled at him.

"Jasmine." Jak said. "Er.....I guess this is the last time I'll see you. It was nice to see you as a giant. I hope I'll dream of you again, but it probably won't be in a giant form. I'll miss you."

"Jak." Jasmine said, smiling. "You are a nice guy, you know, and I have to admit, you are cute. And hey, cheer up! Don't be nervous a lot. I know you don't think I'm the real Jasmine, and that's ok. You're brave and kind to others and you know...you just need to be more confident and not so nervous. Come to think of it, have you had your first kiss?"

"No I-"

Jasmine reached up and pulled Jak down and started to kiss Jak with passion. Jak also started to share the kiss and it was a great feeling. Nostory and Seth slightly rolled their eyes, while Shadow and Kate looked on happily. After the kiss, Jak was shocked.

"You're not a bad kisser." Jasmine said. "You'll need to get better however. But try that. The real Jasmine possibly will love your amateur kissing too. Let's go in together."

Jak simply smiled, blushing madly and took Jasmine's hand. And as they walked in the portal, Jak heard the sweet voice of Jasmine again.

"I'll always protect you Jak. Always."
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: The End.

1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.content:
Jak found himself waking up in his bedroom, fully intact at that.

'Man what a dream....' Jak said, stretching.

After going through his morning routine, he headed off to school earlier than usual, catching the bus early. After arriving, he went ti the lunch room, putting in his ear buds and was listening to music.

He was checking his email and reading gaming articles online on his laptop, but his vision was obscured.

"Guess who?" a voice said.

Jak smiled, as he'd recognize that voice anywhere. "Is that you Jasmine?"

Jasmine moved her hands from covering Jak's eyes. "Hey there." Jasmine said, smiling at Jak. "How are you?"

"I'm good. Slept well." Jak said. "Yourself?"

Jasmine nodded. "I'm great. So... We have quite sometime before class. Would you mind walking around with me?"

Jak internally, was freaking out. Jasmine had asked him to take a walk with her.... They were nearing the end of the year, so better late than never.

Jak nodded. "Let's go." Jak packed his things and him and Jasmine headed outside to walk around the school. Jasmine surprisingly hooked his arm around hers.

"You're nervous..." Jasmine said. "Why?"

"Well, it's not often that I get to walk around with a pretty girl, but you're the prettiest." Jak said.

"You're so sweet, Jak." Jasmine said. "I'm glad we got closer last night."

"Huh?!" Jak said. "Last night? We didn't do-"

Jak then stopped and looked at Jasmine closely. "Wait. So..."

Jasmine smiled. "So I hear you like giant girls?" Jak blushed. "Nah, of course not!" Jak's face gave it away.

Jasmine pulled Jak to the side, under a tree. "I said, I'd always protect you, regardless. You're special to me..."

Jak eyes widened. "So you were acutally...in that dream."

Jasmine nodded. Jak blinked in bafflement, although it was happiness.
"I'm sorry then..." Jak said. "I didn't mean to hurt your feelings..."

"It's ok." Jasmine said. "I understand that you were angry." Jasmine then put her arms around Jak's shoulders. "So... about us..."

Jak looked into Jasmine's blue eyes. "Us..." Jak said, almost instinctively holding Jasmine's hips. Jasmine leaned into his face. "I really like you. I got to see what you're like and learned more about you in a dream than I ever thought possible."

Jak nodded, leaning in closer. 'Now or never.' he thought, and he went in for a kiss, closing his eyes. Jasmine widened her eyes, but closed her eyes and embraced Jak close. After a minute or two in heavenly bless, the two separated.

Jasmine was a beaming ray of sunshine. "Well... Is there anything else you want to add behind that?" Jasmine asked.

"Be my girlfriend." Jak said, almost boldly. "I like you a lot too, you're so awesome and amazing, I just know this'll work out down the road..."

Jasmine raised an eyebrow. "Even though we'll have to fight and possibly save the world from Nostory?"

Jak smiled. "I don't think anyone could say that they saved the world with their boyfriend."

Jasmine giggled. "You're quite the charmer." Jasmine smiled. "Alright. Let's see how far this'll go."

Jak and Jasmine walked back inside the school, holding hands, openly. Many of their friends were in shock and later on that day, after school, they spent the rest day at Jasmine's house. Jak would later meet her parents, and they kept their fresh new relationship quiet for now.

Before leaving, Jasmine walked with Jak to the bus stop, where he'd wait for the vehicle to drop him off near his home.

"I'll see you tomorrow." Jak said, smiling. "I had an amazing day."

Jasmine smiled. "Here, one more for the road."

Jak and Jasmine again, kissed under the street light. As their eyes were closed, both shsred a vision, Jak being shrunk and kissing the giant Jasmine, which she used her tongue.

After a minute the bus driver honked, as he arrived,snapping the couple back into reality. "Alright you love birds, you getting on?"

"Bye Jasmine." Jak said, walking onto the bus.

"Bye my little guy." Jasmine said, almost in a soft whisper.

And with that, Jak headed home. In a year or less, these two would meet with fate and destiny. That would be addressed later. A relationship full of possibilities was on their minds now...
1111112221222111221112111112211111211121.title: Epilogue

12.content:
The next thing Jack knew he was in a strange place. He looked around and he didn't seem to see anything.
"W-where am I?" he thought. "This isn't my room." He looked around a little more. "at least there isn't any homework here."
But then he began to hear something. It seemed to be someone crying. At first he didn't seem to want to hear it. But eventually he couldn't help but hear it.
He walked towards where the crying was. He expected to see someone whow as normal. But instead he saw Jasmine. She was a girl that jack had a crush on at school. But he didn't expect her to see her so big. She was at least 50 feet tall. She was also crying her eyes out.
"W-what's wrong?" asked Jak.
But then Jasmine looked at him. She was in some terror and she began to move away from him. She seemed to be afraid of him.
"What are you?" asked Jasmine.
"I'm a human."
"I know you're human. But you don't look like all the others."
"What do you mean?
12.title: The dream begins

121.content:
"Well you're a man," said Jasmine.
Jak found this quite strnge. "and your [point being?" replied Jak.
"Men died out years and years ago."
"What?" This shocked him greatly. It took him a minute to collect his thoughts. "But how?"
"A meteor crashed and radiation filled the planet. Anyone with a Y chromosome was killed. Anyone without was made immortal."
"Immortal? Did they make them as big as you as well?"
"No I'm something else." She then gently picked him up and brought him tup to her level. Her palm was veyr soft. "You know you're pretty cute."
"Thanks I guess."
"You're the cutest man on the planet. But at the same time you're the ugliest man on the planet."
"So I'm the only man on the planet?"
"That's right."
"But if this planet has that radiation then shouldn't I be poisoned?"
"No the radiation went away years ago."
121.title: No men

1211.content:
As he sat in her palm, he felt that he had alot of questions for her. " So what will they do if they find me?" asked Jak. " Well, if the Amazonians find you , they'll arrest you but if the Femists find you, you'll be safe." said Jasmine.

" What happened to society when men died out?" asked Jak. " Women filled in. It was difficult at first but they mananged to fill in. For awhile we had a perfect world, no crime as most of them were committed by men and next to no pollution." said Jasmine.

" It didn't last." said Jak, sitting down in her palm. " Your correct. Eventually a woman by the name of Amy Zonn came along and said we weren't fulfilling our potential as the master race on this planet, how men made us weak and our ideals were holding us back." said Jasmine.

She stopped to take a breath but then she felt something was not right, she felt someone was watching them.
1211.title: Continue

12112.content:
Jasmine thought she was imaging things and looked back at the little man in her palm. He was such a cutest guy on the planet! The only guy too, she thought. She lay on the ground and put him on her stomach.

" So who do you support." asked Jak. " Neither, I prefer to be neutral." said Jak. " You don't like wars huh?' replied Jak. " Nope, too bloody so I ran away from it all. I live here alone with only you for company and some hunters." said Jasmine.

" Don;t you ever feel alone?" asked Jak. " No, I'm the only one of my kind here anyway so that'll never change." said Jasmine, she took Jak off her stomach and laid him on the guy. " Now, I just want to watch the clouds go by. You can stay if you want." said Jasmine.
